definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The gun usually kicks back. Watch out for it.
sentences.chinese: 槍通常有後座力，要注意。

sentences.english: The rear seats are extremely comfortable and the L-shaped headrests improve the driver's rear view visibility.
sentences.chinese: 後座非常舒適的L型頭枕改善司機的後視能見度。

sentences.english: He slept in the back of the car and made handshake deals.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他就睡在車後座，跟別人達成握手協議。

sentences.english: The larger footprint yields a roomier rear seat and trunk.
sentences.chinese: 較大的足跡產生一個寬敞的後座和軀幹。

sentences.english: Accidents in backseats are caused by children.
sentences.chinese: 坐在後座上的小孩會發生意外。

sentences.english: The wisdom of the retired generals and backbench MPs conjoins.
sentences.chinese: 退役將軍和後座議員的智慧結合在一起。

sentences.english: No one likes Daphne because she's a back-seat driver.
sentences.chinese: 沒人喜歡達芙妮，因爲他是個後座司機。

sentences.english: Two small children sat in the backseat, their eyes wide with fear.
sentences.chinese: 兩個小孩坐在後座上，他們的眼睛因恐懼睜得大大的。

sentences.english: And the Apple iPad is now putting the nail in the coffin of expensive rear-entertainment systems.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果平板電腦現今正使昂貴的後座娛樂系統走向終結。

sentences.english: Why do I get more car sick in the back?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼坐在車的後座更容易暈車和不適？

sentences.english: I had a terrifying journey on the pillion seat of a Honda 750.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在本田750摩托車後座上有一次嚇人的旅程。
車子後座的意外會“導致”小孩。

sentences.english: Two men forced him into the back seat.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人強拉着他坐在了後座。

sentences.english: Large size is also an issue, George could only stand in the back seat of the master off-road vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 體型太大問題，喬治只能站在主人越野車的後座上。

sentences.english: As the fuel pump is located under the rear seat everything in the back had to be pulled out.
sentences.chinese: 在後面由於燃油泵是根據位於後座一切都必須退出。

sentences.english: "Belinda was sitting in the back seat of my car, " said Saeed.
sentences.chinese: 貝琳達當時就坐在我車的後座上。

definition: locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
